Q_DESC:
This  Program checks if string is palindrome using stack. Here we need to check if given string is a palindrome or not using stack application.
INPUT : 
The Input line must contain the input string to be checked ;if it is a palindrome or not
TESTCASE_1:
civic
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
civic is a Palindrome string
TESTCASE_2:
stupid
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
stupid is not a Palindrome string
TESTCASE_3:
google
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
google is not a Palindrome string
